name: Tic Tac Together
description:
Tic Tac Together is a team-based twist on tic tac toe. Every round, all moves are placed on the board at the same time. If X's and O's are placed in the same space, the teams have to duke it out on a smaller "inner board" to claim it. The game quickly spirals out of control as more inner boards are created and the number of possible moves grows.



Up to twelve players can join the game from their phone or browser through a simple web interface with no downloads required.



Games are highly customizable, so players can come up with new and interesting ways to play.
Customizable settings include:
  • Number of moves per player
  • Inner boards at the start of a games
  • Number of players on each team
  • Time to enter move
  • More!
